body.name: TEYADI 500GB 2.5-inch Slim Portable External Hard Drive -USB 3.0 for PC, Mac, Laptop, PS4, Xbox, Xbox one-T201(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 50 mins
features: 2.5" HDD External Hard Drive supports Windows / Mac / Linux / Android. TEYADI external hard drive can be connected with multiple devices like PC, Laptop and MAC. It improves performance by transferring data at lightning speed. Our Portable hard disk's USB 2.0/3.0 version provides read and write speeds up to 10 Gbps .
The motherboard adopts noise-free solution, giving you a quiet working environment. Lightweight and portable size designed to fit in your pocket for easy portability.
This external drive is ready to use without external power supply or software installation needed. Ideal extra storage for your computer and game console.

What You Get - 1 X Portable Hard Drive, 1 X USB3.0 Cable, 1 X User Manual, 3 Years Manufacturer Warranty And Lifetime Technical Support. (If For Any Reason You Are Not Satisfied, Please Contact Us And We Promise To Make It Right For You.)

Tip: The file system selected when the hard disk is formatted at the factory may not be very compatible with the computer operating system, you can follow the steps in the picture to format it, and then you can use it normally.
body.description: Introducing TEYADI-T201 Portable Hard Drive USB 3.0 Ready, USB 2.0 Compatible No need to install software, plug and play, quickly and securely store large amounts of photos, movies, music and various data. Whether at home, in the office or on the road, USB 3.0 provides fast and easy storage and is compatible with the USB 2.0 interface Windows doesn’t show up in the file manager, you should Open Disk Management on Windows 8 or 10, right-click the start button and select “Disk Management”.On Windows 7, press Windows+R to open the Run dialog, type diskmgmt.msc into it, and press Enter

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing TEYADI-T201 Portable Hard Drive USB 3.0 Ready, USB 2.0 Compatible No need to install software, plug and play, quickly and securely store large amounts of photos, movies, music and various data. Whether at home, in the office or on the road, USB 3.0 provides fast and easy storage and is compatible with the USB 2.0 interface Windows doesn’t show up in the file manager, you should Open Disk Management on Windows 8 or 10, right-click the start button and select “Disk Management”.On Windows 7, press Windows+R to open the Run dialog, type diskmgmt.msc into it, and press Enter Capacity May be Different Due to Use of a Different Measurement Standard 320GB≈298GB 500GB≈465GB 1TB≈931GB

Terabytes More Storage Stay ahead of the curve with the TEYADI Portable External Hard Drive, You have the flexibility to connect to old and new devices，Neatly organise and store all your files, without having to worry about running out of space. Compatibility USB 3.0 ultra-high-speed USB connection, can transfer data at 10Gbit/s speed,Plus， USB 3.0 & 2.0 compatibility allows for high speed data transfer with no external AC power cord needed. Simple Elegance Ultra Slim and Sturdy Metal Design: Merely 0.5 inch thick. All-Aluminum anti-scratch model delivers remarkable strength and durability, keeping this portable hard drive running cool and quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST EXTERNAL HARD DRIVE IV OWNED!
reviews.reviewText: The TEYADI 320GB Portable Ultra Slim External Hard Drive is an absolute gem! It's a fantastic addition to my gaming setup, and here's why I couldn't be happier:Incredible Value for Money: The reasonable price of this external hard drive is a steal for the quality and performance it offers. It's a budget-friendly option without compromising on functionality.Ultra Slim and Lightweight: The slim design and lightweight build make it incredibly portable. It's literally pocket-sized, which is a huge plus for someone like me who's always on the go. Easy portability means I can take my games and files with me wherever I need them.Blazing Fast Speeds: The USB 2.0/3.0 compatibility provides lightning-fast read and write speeds of up to 10 Gbps. This ensures that transferring files and loading games is a breeze. It's a game-changer for efficiency and convenience.Perfect for Gaming Consoles: I use this external hard drive primarily with my Xbox, and it's a match made in heaven. Games download to the hard drive at an impressive speed, saving me valuable time and allowing for a seamless gaming experience. It's also a great addition for PlayStation users.Reliable 320GB Capacity: While it may not be the largest storage option out there, the 320GB capacity is more than enough for my gaming needs. It strikes a perfect balance between space and portability.In summary, the TEYADI 320GB Portable Ultra Slim External Hard Drive is a phenomenal piece of tech. Its reasonable price, ultra-slim and lightweight design, blazing-fast speeds, and compatibility with gaming consoles make it an absolute winner in my book. If you're looking for a reliable and budget-friendly external hard drive, this is the one to get. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed a Hard drive because I didnt want to erase all my old pictures of my phone. You will got an amazing Hard drive for the price, built with good materials, it doesnt feel like a cheap HDD. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready to use right out of the box
reviews.reviewText: This drive is super convenient to store movies, music or anything that you want. I use it to store movies on and then I just connect it to my tv with the USB cable that is provided and watch them. It makes watching movies really easy if you go to a friend’s place. Yes they are small enough to fit in your pocket and very sturdy. Plus they do not need an external power source just plug them in and use.If your car or TV has a standard USB you can either watch movies or music. Very cool for roadtrips for listening to podcasts or books or your favorite music. The TEYADI hard drives come ready to use and can be used on your Windows PC, Mac or for that matter games like PS4 or Xbox. They come in sizes from 320 GB and 500 GB to 1 TB.I have the 320 and the 500 and they both perform flawlessly. They come with the needed USB3.0 cable and a 3 year warranty plus free lifetime tech support. I use them on both USB 3.0 or the older USB 2.0 because my desktop only has one port that’s 3.0. Another great item from Amazon that truly is a 5 star hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly very fast. I use it to hold games for my galaxy laptop . sad to see my games did not work with snapdragon video.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent external drive
reviews.reviewText: I always travel with a portable drive for my important files. I do store files up in the cloud but when camping, flying, etc. internet is not always available so this slim, lightweight drive is my answer.
Used to record with Bell Satellite systems
This portable hard drive is not worth the money. The transmission speed is too slow. Not recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: The device has no encryption software.
reviews.reviewText: Although advertised as encrypted, this device has no encryption software installed, it's just a big memory stick.
